word_mean: 去污染〔作用〕：使人或物除去某些污染物质，如军用毒气、放射性物质等

sentence.Network_en: The land will require public money for decontamination.
sentence.Network_cn: 需要动用公共资金来对这片土地进行污染清理。

sentence.Network_en: Did we all look that stupid when we went through decontamination?
sentence.Network_cn: 我们原来在消毒过程也像那么苯 吗 ?

sentence.Network_en: Routine decontamination schedule be reviewed to detect any possible failures.
sentence.Network_cn: 审核常规去污染方案,检测任何可能失误.

所谓去污染（decontamination）就是人为地将机体的正常菌群或已定植的细菌，部分或全部去除的一种防止感染措施，一般可分为全 …

entry.tran: 清除…的有害物质;对…消毒;给…去污;净化
entry.def: To decontaminate something means to remove all germs or dangerous substances from it.

example.ex: ...procedures for decontaminating pilots hit by chemical weapons.
example.tran: 为被化学武器击中的飞行员消毒的程序
